Title: Warmly welcome the founding of the Hunan Provincial Revolutionary Committee – 10 April 1968
Notes: This poster, possibly a fake, shows Mao Zedong, Lin Biao, Jiang Qing, Zhou Enlai, Kang Sheng, and Chen Boda, on the rostrum of the Gate of Heavenly Peace, Beijing. It was published on the occasion of the establishment of the Hunan Provincial Revolutionary Committee on 10 April 1968.The Mao quotation reads "The Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution is in essence a great political revolution waged by the proletarian class against the capitalist class and all exploiting classes under the guidelines of socialism. It is the continuation of the long struggle between the great revolutionary masses under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party and the Guomindang reactionaries, the continuation of the class struggle between the proletariat and the capitalist class."
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)Revolutionary Committees (1967)Jiang QingLin BiaoZhou EnlaiKang ShengChen Boda
